name: Horror Game (Juppi)
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night and suddenly ...

Note: If it's too dark or the mouse sensitivity is too slow, please use the settings (Tab key)

W/A/S/D to move
Shift to sprint
Control to sneak
Space to jump
Mouse Movement to look around
Left Mouse Button to pick up or release objects
Tab to open the settings menu

Microwave sounds are from https://www.zapsplat.com/
